Text: Reuters Contract Negotiation Cc You have been identified as a current subscriber to our Reuters Cobra or IFinance Market Data We are currently in the process of renegotiating these licenses Please respond no later than Tuesday May th with your Co and RC Future ongoing services will be allocated to the appropriate cost centers This information will allow us to negotiate in an informed manner Individual costs will be determined at the time we have gathered all subscriber details I appreciate your assistance with this effort Paula Corey Sr Contracts Manager

RDI Subscription Cc You have been identified as a current subscriber to an RDI database These databases include Base Case PowerDat GasDat CoalDat This contract is expiring and as part of the renegotiation we will need your acceptance to allocate the costs of this information to your Co and RC Please respond with the desired application Co and RC prior to March th Thank you Paula Corey Sr Contracts Manager

Re ECI ID for Stinson Cc Could you please escalate per our conversation Thank you Paula Forwarded by Paula CoreyEnron Communications on AM Stinson CT AM To Timothy MoritaMcVeyEnron NRON NRON cc Paula CoreyEnron nron Communications Jean MrhaEnron nron Communications Subject Re ECI ID for Stinson Timothy I still have a problem When I am on the ECI network I cannot receive email and even worse I cannot even send email This is not an acceptable situation I need to have a fully functional email account on the ECI side as well as the ENA side Dont tell me that its against policy because I know that Ravi Thuraisingham has already be set up this way for months I dont care if mail from one network is forwarded to the other as I will have access in Houston to both but I can already see that I need to have functional accounts on both sides or it will be a continual thorn in my side when travelling to Portland etc Again thanks for your help on getting this set up correctly Stinson Gibner x From Timothy Morita NRON COMMUNICATIONS on AM PST To Stinson NRON cc Subject Re ECI ID Thanks Stinson That should give me what I need I understand that you will have two Notes IDs with the ECI mail forwarded to your Stinson NRON address I should be able to complete this today later today Thanks Timothy MoritaMcVey Lotus Notes Administrator Enron Communications Inc TimothyMorita nronnet Stinson CT AM To Timothy MoritaMcVeyEnron nron Communications cc Subject ECI ID I must have written down your phone number incorrectly it did not work Regarding my user ID on the ECI network I would be set up in the same way as Ravi Thuraisingham with an ID on both the ENA and the ECI networks I am in the Corp research group but am spending about of my time in support of ECI in the trading and origination areas Feel free to contact me if you need any further info Stinson Houston x
Re Stinson Gibner Cc We actually need to duplicate his ENA workstation as he will be reporting at both locations P

Doreen I spoke with Doreen this morning re our San Francisco project Please forward info to her at Are you up fro brunch at my house on Sunday with Bill and Mary Kathryn will be home on midterm break P

Resume Forwarded at Request of Brian Mihura This is the resume I told you about P Forwarded by Paula CoreyEnron Communications on PM PM To Paula CoreyEnron nron Communications cc Subject Resume Forwarded at Request of Brian Mihura Dear Paula My name is Matt Gunning and I am a friend and former colleague of Brian Mihura Brian mentioned that you would be interested in seeing my resume which I have attached If you have questions or need more information please contact me Thank you for your consideration atthtm Resumewps

Guiseppe PaleologoEXT EBband Shirley I have verified that his phone is in and working at Stinsons former desk Please let me know if I may be of further assistance Thank you Paula Forwarded by Paula CoreyEnron Communications on AM Janelle CT AM To Paula CoreyEnron nron Communications Martha ReynaEnron nron Communications Guiseppe nron cc Subject Guiseppe PaleologoEXT EBb Sorry for the inconvenience please advise if we can be of further assistance Thank you for your patience Forwarded by Janelle DureeHOUECT on AM Linda Richard PM To Janelle CT cc Kathy nron Subject Guiseppe PaleologoEXT EBb Janelle FMS records show that ext was installed on for Mr Paleologo There is no record to indicate the phone was ever PUDed I have requested to Kathy Brooks to reinstall the phone Kathy says that she will reseach to find out why the phone was picked up and she will let me know Thanks Linda

Re Move computer from the Research Group th Floor to the th Floor Cc I spoke with Janelle Duree Manager Move Team she is investigating the mystery of the missing phone and will call me back with status If you can take care of the PC I think we look good on the phone I also spoke with Paul Racicot to make sure we are all of the same mind and he is set as well P Shirley CT PM To Emmanuel nron cc Clayton NRON Paula CoreyEnron nron Communications Vince J CT Subject Move computer from the Research Group th Floor to the th Floor Hi Emmanuel We need a computer installed on the th floor tomorrow if at all possible We have a new summer intern coming on Monday the th and the computer and everything else has disappeared from his desk The location is EBB The computer we are moving is Clayton Vernons old computer He is finishing up moving his files to his new computer as I am writing this Please call me in the morning and we will talk further Thanks Shirley Crenshaw

Great Divide Lodge Cc Shirley I have spoken with Steve Collins the National Sales Manager at Great Divide Lodge He has agreed to honor our credit as long as we fulfill the following two requirements Confirm reservations prior to July Hold event prior to Thanksgiving The appropriate contact number is Steven Collins Thanks for working with us on that Paula

Great Divide Lodge Cc Shirley I have spoken with Steve Collins the National Sales Manager at Great Divide Lodge He has agreed to honor our credit as long as we fulfill the following two requirements Confirm reservations prior to July Hold event prior to Thanksgiving The appropriate contact number is Steven Collins Thanks for working with us on that Paula

RE FW Dynegy vs Enron A Tale of Two CompaniesBrian and I will meet you at outside AC at Original Message From Kaminski Vince J Sent Wednesday October PM To Corey Paula Subject Re FW Dynegy vs Enron A Tale of Two Companies Where I am in a meeting Vince vince kaminski
pst Look at this it will cheer you up wwwsfgatecomcomicsfiore
pst want to grab a quick sandwich
pst I drove today Whats up
pst I am done with my meetings give me a shout when you are ready to go home

RE remote offices Cc The New York rd Ave office is closed and has been inventoried I am now working on the removal of the IT equipment The Madison office is leased under MG Metals and only a few ENA employees remain at that location Chicago Montreal and Toronto include some MG people and I am hoping to have some clarity on these locations early in the new year I appreciate your assistance Paula Corey Original Message From Miller Don Asset Mktg Sent Wednesday December PM To Kitchen Louise Shepperd Tammy R Colwell Wes Cc Mccarthy Lance Corey Paula Helton Susan Subject RE remote offices What about Toronto and New York Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Wednesday December PM To Shepperd Tammy R Colwell Wes Cc Mccarthy Lance Corey Paula Helton Susan Miller Don Asset Mktg Subject RE remote offices OK Please check with Don Miller too Netco does not want San Francisco going forward and probably not Chicago Original Message From Shepperd Tammy R Sent Wednesday December PM To Colwell Wes Kitchen Louise Cc Mccarthy Lance Corey Paula Helton Susan Subject remote offices We have asked EPSC to pay the following leases for the month of January based on feedback from ENA commercial leadership My understanding is that we may still reject these leases under the bankruptcy if we do so by Feb I will revisit the status of these leases with you before February rents are to be paid Calgary Portland San Francisco Chicago Denver I have also been contacted by Paula Corey who is working on the enterprise strategy for the retrieval and disposition of remote office contents in the event any of these offices are closed I will keep you posted on the recommendations Regards Tammy

RE remote offices Cc The New York rd Ave office is closed and has been inventoried I am now working on the removal of the IT equipment The Madison office is leased under MG Metals and only a few ENA employees remain at that location Chicago Montreal and Toronto include some MG people and I am hoping to have some clarity on these locations early in the new year I appreciate your assistance Paula Corey Original Message From Miller Don Asset Mktg Sent Wednesday December PM To Kitchen Louise Shepperd Tammy R Colwell Wes Cc Mccarthy Lance Corey Paula Helton Susan Subject RE remote offices What about Toronto and New York Original Message From Kitchen Louise Sent Wednesday December PM To Shepperd Tammy R Colwell Wes Cc Mccarthy Lance Corey Paula Helton Susan Miller Don Asset Mktg Subject RE remote offices OK Please check with Don Miller too Netco does not want San Francisco going forward and probably not Chicago Original Message From Shepperd Tammy R Sent Wednesday December PM To Colwell Wes Kitchen Louise Cc Mccarthy Lance Corey Paula Helton Susan Subject remote offices We have asked EPSC to pay the following leases for the month of January based on feedback from ENA commercial leadership My understanding is that we may still reject these leases under the bankruptcy if we do so by Feb I will revisit the status of these leases with you before February rents are to be paid Calgary Portland San Francisco Chicago Denver I have also been contacted by Paula Corey who is working on the enterprise strategy for the retrieval and disposition of remote office contents in the event any of these offices are closed I will keep you posted on the recommendations Regards Tammy

RE CQGpst Joe Please provide your Co and RC and we will bill it to your cost center Thank you Paula Original Message From Parks Joe Sent Monday March PM To Corey Paula Subject CQG Paula what do I need to do to retain my rights to CQG joe
